changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.createView: SELECT ba.id, b.id AS network_rule, a.name AS attribute, ba.key AS key, ba.numeric_value, ba.integer_value, ba.boolean_value, ba.text_value, u.name AS unit, ba.notes, up.name AS updated_by, ba.version FROM status_code_network_attribute ba JOIN status_code_network b ON ba.network_rule = b.id JOIN attribute a ON ba.attribute = a.id LEFT JOIN unit u ON ba.unit = u.id JOIN agency up ON ba.updated_by = up.id;
